dcterms:creator: Kfir Aberman
Yijia Weng
Dani Lischinski
Daniel Cohen-Or
Baoquan Chen
dcterms:description: A widely used motion style dataset containing 16 distinct style labels including angry, happy, old, etc., with a total duration of 193 minutes.
dcterms:title: Aberman et al. (2020) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Shihong Xia
Congyi Wang
Jinxiang Chai
Jessica Hodgins
dcterms:description: A smaller motion style collection (25 mins) captured in 8 styles, with accurate action type annotation (8 actions). The motions are typically shorter than 3 seconds.
dcterms:title: Xia et al. (2015) Dataset

dcterms:description: An unlabeled dataset with high diversity and quantity of motion data, retargeted to the same 21-joint skeleton structure, with a 10% held-out subset for evaluation.
dcterms:title: CMU Mocap (CMU)
